import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Router from 'next/router' import { normalizationTime, getNowDate } from '../../common/js/timeFilter' import styles from './content.sass' const Content = ({ topic }) => { const [routeName, setRouteName] = useState('') useEffect(() => { setRouteName(Router.router.query.name) }) const updateTime = time => { console.log(Math.round(getNowDate())) } return (
